name: A Planet's Tale
description:
A Planet's Tale--a 2D story-driven platformer made for the Women In Games Jam 2021! The given theme was "atmosphere".

You land on an uninhabited planet, devoid of a viable atmosphere and of life itself--the only clues are scattered fragments of those who once lived here. Why did they leave? What caused the air pollution on this planet?

Prototype for a potential future project.

Assets Used:

Menu Background: https://pixabay.com/photos/stars-milky-way-night-sky-blue-sky-1869692/

Art assets courtesy of Kenney's Game Assets (https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1) and Aiden Art (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/free-pixel-space-platform-pa...)

Music used courtesy of VOiD1Gaming: https://void1gaming.itch.io/free-horror-music-pack
